DOC.brief_summary: This safety tolerability study investigate effect HPP593 healthy volunteer limb immobilization .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study HPP593 Subjects During After Limb Immobilization
DOC.criteria: Nonsmoking . Subjects must good health , determine medical history , physical examination , vital sign , electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , clinical test result . Not restrict wheelchair confine bed . Weight ≥ 50.0 kg . BMI 18 27.5 kg/m2 , inclusive , time screen . Any following abnormality Screening Visit Baseline : Fasting glucose > 110 mg/dL ( Screening visit ) . Serum creatinine > 1.5 mg/dL . If serum creatinine > 1.5 mg/dL creatinine clearance > 60 mL/min , subject need exclude Troponin I level upper limit normal ( ULN ) Liver function test ( LFTs ) > 1.5x ULN Evidence significant organ system dysfunction ( e.g . diabetes , cardiovascular disease , cirrhosis , hypogonadism , hypo hyperthyroidism ; hypertension ) Any fluctuation weight ( ± 2 % body weight ) subject self report 3 month prior Screening Visit . Has receive HPP593 previous clinical trial . Smoking within 6 month prior Day 1 . Michigan Alcohol Screening Test score great 2 .
